entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning early this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023
